$values.description_text: Defines the location where each turn starts
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: The striker must start play from the baseline.
$values.value_translated_automated: Umgadli kufanele aqale ukudlala kusukela ekuqaleni.

$values.description_text: Defines the carrom board
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Here we see a carrom board.

$values.description_text: Defines the break at the start of a round
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Each game of carrom will start with all scoring pieces bunched up in the center. The first shot of the round is called the break.
$values.value_translated_automated: Umdlalo ngamunye we-carrom uzoqala ngazo zonke izingcezu zokushaya eziqoqwe phakathi nendawo. Ishothi yokuqala yomzuliswano ibizwa ngekhefu.

$values.description_text: Shows the user what a break may look like
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Here a bot demonstrates a break.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to take a shot at a break
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu

$values.description_text: Defines the strategy behind a break scenario
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: A well hit break should disperse the pieces across the board. A skilled player might be able to give themselves an advantage for the entire round from a good break and subsequent shots.
$values.value_translated_automated: Ikhefu elishaya kahle kufanele lihlakaze izingcezu ebhodini. Umdlali onekhono angase akwazi ukuzinika inzuzo yawo wonke umjikelezo kusukela ekhefini elihle kanye namashothi alandelayo.

$values.description_text: Defines the camera controls
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: You can change camera angles by pressing 0, 1, 2, or 3. The recommended playing camera is 1. You can move your camera at anytime by holding right click and moving the mouse. See more camera controls in the controls menu.
$values.value_translated_automated: Ungashintsha ama-engeli ekhamera ngokucindezela u-0, 1, 2, noma 3. Ikhamera enconywayo edlalayo ithi 1. Ungakwazi ukuhambisa ikhamera yakho nganoma isiphi isikhathi ngokubamba ukuchofoza kwesokudla bese uhambisa igundane. Bona ezinye izilawuli zekhamera kumenyu yezilawuli.

$values.description_text: Defines the game of carrom
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Carrom is played by flicking discs into other discs to push them into holes on the board. Doing so successfully grants you another turn. The game ends when a team runs out of discs to target.
$values.value_translated_automated: I-Carrom idlalwa ngokuqhweba ama-disc kwamanye ama-disc ukuze awaphushele emigodini ebhodini. Ukwenza kanjalo ngempumelelo kukunikeza elinye ithuba. Umdlalo uphela lapho iqembu liphelelwa amadiski elizowaqondisa.

$values.description_text: Defines how chat can be used
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Turn history and chat can be opened by pressing T.
$values.value_translated_automated: Guqula umlando futhi ingxoxo ingavulwa ngokucindezela u-T.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user that they are prepared for carrom
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: You have completed the tutorial! You are now ready to play carrom games with friends and bots.
$values.value_translated_automated: Uqedile okokufundisa! Manje usukulungele ukudlala imidlalo ye-carrom nabangani nama-bots.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to move their cursor to the correct location
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Place your cursor on the baseline to start your shot.
$values.value_translated_automated: Beka ikhesa yakho kusisekelo ukuze uqale ukudubula kwakho.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to perform an action to add power to the shot
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Drag your cursor away from your target while continuing to hold left click.
$values.value_translated_automated: Hudula ikhesa yakho kude nethagethi yakho ngenkathi uqhubeka nokubamba ukuchofoza kwesokunxele.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to perform an action to confirm their striker placement
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Left click and hold to confirm your striker placement.
$values.value_translated_automated: Chofoza kwesokunxele bese ubamba ukuze uqinisekise ukubeka umhlaseli wakho.

$values.description_text: Defines the pause menu functionality
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: The pause menu contains application settings and controls, and can be accessed at any time by pressing the escape key.
$values.value_translated_automated: Imenyu yokumisa isikhashana iqukethe izilungiselelo zohlelo lokusebenza nezilawuli, futhi ingafinyelelwa noma nini ngokucindezela inkinobho yokuphuma.

$values.description_text: Defines the pockets
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Standard carrom boards come with four holes, called pockets, in each corner.
$values.value_translated_automated: Amabhodi e-carrom ajwayelekile afika nezimbobo ezine, ezibizwa ngokuthi amaphakethe, ekhoneni ngalinye.

$values.description_text: Shows the user their first carrom shot example
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: These pockets are where you are aiming to sink the discs. Watch as our bot plays.
$values.value_translated_automated: La maphakethe yilapho uhlose ukucwilisa khona ama-disc. Buka njengoba i-bot yethu idlala.

$values.description_text: Defines the queen
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Professional mode will require the queen to be pocketed to complete the round. To score the queen, you must first pocket the queen and then successfully pocket your next shot to cover the queen. Failing to do so will return the queen to the board.
$values.value_translated_automated: Imodi yobungcweti izodinga ukuthi indlovukazi ifakwe ephaketheni ukuze iqedele umjikelezo. Ukuze uthole amaphuzu endlovukazi, kufanele uqale ufake indlovukazi ephaketheni bese ufaka ngempumelelo ishothi lakho elilandelayo ukuze umboze indlovukazi. Ukuhluleka ukwenza lokho kuzobuyisela indlovukazi ebhodini.

$values.description_text: Shows the user professional mode's queen pocketing sequence
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Here's a scenario. Watch the bot pocket and then cover the queen.
$values.value_translated_automated: Nasi isimo. Buka iphakethe le-bot bese umboza indlovukazi.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to try pocketing the queen, then cover it the next turn
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Try it yourself. First the queen, then the white piece.
$values.value_translated_automated: Zizame wena. Okokuqala indlovukazi, bese kuba ucezu olumhlophe.

$values.description_text: Recommends the user try an easy game mode
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Points mode is recommended for your first couple of games. This provides you lots of opportunities for scoring.
$values.value_translated_automated: Imodi yamaphoyinti iyanconywa kumidlalo yakho embalwa yokuqala. Lokhu kukunikeza amathuba amaningi okushaya amagoli.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to perform an action to release the striker
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Release left click to flick your striker into play.
$values.value_translated_automated: Khipha ukuchofoza kwesokunxele ukuze uguqule umdlali wakho adlale.

$values.description_text: Defines how the scoreboard can be used
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Different game modes have different scoring rules, but the score can be viewed at anytime by pressing the TAB key.
$values.value_translated_automated: Amamodi egeyimu ahlukene anemithetho ehlukene yokushaya amaphuzu, kodwa umphumela ungabukwa noma nini ngokucindezela ukhiye we-TAB.

$values.description_text: Defines how different game modes handle scoring
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Professional and disc pool modes will have you only aiming to pocket your team's color, while points mode assigns different point values for each differently colored piece. Typically, a red colored piece is high value, and is referred to as the queen.
$values.value_translated_automated: Amamodi ochwepheshe nawe-disc pool azokwenza ukuthi uhlose kuphela ukufaka ephaketheni umbala weqembu lakho, kuyilapho imodi yamaphoyinti inikezela amanani ahlukene wamaphuzu esiqeshana ngasinye esinemibala ehlukile. Ngokuvamile, ucezu olunombala obomvu luyinani eliphezulu, futhi lubizwa ngokuthi indlovukazi.

$values.description_text: Well wishes from our development team
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu

$values.description_text: Defines the striker
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: The disc used to start play is called the striker.
$values.value_translated_automated: I-disc esetshenziswa ukuqala ukudlala ibizwa ngokuthi umgadli.

$values.description_text: Shows the user what a turn might look like
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Now let's try to sink our first shot. Watch the bot first.
$values.value_translated_automated: Manje ake sizame ukucwilisa isibhamu sethu sokuqala. Buka i-bot kuqala.

$values.description_text: Encourages the user to try pocketing the white piece
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Now your turn. Hit that white piece into the pocket next to it just like the bot.
$values.value_translated_automated: Manje yithuba lakho. Shaya leso siqeshana esimhlophe ephaketheni eduze kwalo njenge-bot.

$values.description_text: Defines Carrom Slam! and the tutorial
$values.description_location: An instruction in the carrom tutorial menu
$values.value_english: Carrom Slam! is a carrom simulator game. This tutorial will teach you the controls and how to play carrom.
$values.value_translated_automated: I-Carrom Slam! ngumdlalo we-carrom simulator. Lesi sifundo sizokufundisa izilawuli kanye nendlela yokudlala i-carrom.

$values.description_text: Views the events log and chat
$values.description_location: A button on the focused menu

$values.description_text: Views the pause menu, allowing the user to setup their game
$values.description_location: A button on the focused menu

$values.description_text: Returns to the previous menu
$values.description_location: A button on many pages, including the settings menu

$values.description_text: Views the scoreboard
$values.description_location: A button on the focused menu

$values.description_text: Jumps to the previous menu
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Zooms the camera further to the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Zooms the camera closer to the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the camera backward from the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the camera down from the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the camera forward towards the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the camera left from the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the camera right from the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the camera up from the focus point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the pointer down from the current point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the pointer left from the current point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the pointer right from the current point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Moves the pointer up from the current point
$values.description_location: A rebindable action in the controls tab of the settings menu

$values.description_text: Describes the state of the game as not started yet, before the game
$values.description_location: A label in the mini scoreboard

$values.description_text: States the queen and another piece have been sunk on the same turn, a special message
$values.description_location: An event message from the system
$values.value_english: Team {0} {1} has combo covered the queen!

$values.description_text: Describes the disc pool game mode
$values.description_location: An option in a drop down menu in the rules menu

$values.description_text: Choice of showing exact power on striker
$values.description_location: A rule in the rules menu

$values.description_text: Choice of showing piece trajectory
$values.description_location: A rule in the rules menu

$values.description_text: Choice of whether to invert the starting break
$values.description_location: A rule in the rules menu

$values.description_text: Describes the amount of bots that spawn by default
$values.description_location: A setting in the settings menu

$values.description_text: Describes the default new bot difficulty
$values.description_location: A setting in the settings menu
